code: import React from"react";import{useTheme}from"../ThemeContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ProjectTile(props){var darkMode=useTheme();var themeStyles={mainFont:{color:darkMode?'white':'black'},tech:{backgroundColor:darkMode?'rgb(78, 78, 78)':'rgb(207, 242, 242)',color:darkMode?'var(--mid-color)':'#4d4d4d'},links:{color:darkMode?'rgb(96, 176, 245)':'#1200e2',borderBottom:darkMode?'solid 1px rgb(96, 176, 245)':'solid 1px #1200e2'}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-tile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-thumb-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:require("../images/".concat(props.data.thumbnail)),alt:props.data.thumbDesc})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-tile-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-desc-container",style:themeStyles.mainFont,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"project-title",children:props.data.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"project-desc",children:props.data.desc})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tech-used",children:props.data.tech.map(function(tech){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:themeStyles.tech,children:tech});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-link-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:props.data.liveLink,style:themeStyles.links,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"project-link",children:"Live"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:props.data.codeLink,style:themeStyles.links,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",className:"project-link",children:"Code"})]})]})]});}//
